posts.post_title: A few cards for sale or trade--Final Bump
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Leslie Westbrook
I'm selling the following cards, and I prefer Paypal, but I will accept a money order. All prices include shipping and paypal fees. If interested in trading, I'd prefer a single-card trade for the lot, but I'll listen to other offers as well. I'm also posting a few post-war cards for sale in that category, so take a look if you're interested. I'll also accept sell and trade offers on the entire group of cards, pre- and post-war combined. Thanks!

NEW PRICE OFFER: $30 for what's left, Thanks!
